communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Records related to the Oak Park Police Department’s Flock Safety system, specifically:

1.  All Flock related records delivered to the citizen police oversight body including, but not limited to the following:
1.1  Searches conducted by the department
1.2  Searches by outside agencies that included the department's Flock network
1.3  Flock Activity reports
1.4  Memos and other reports

2. Current data sharing that includes:
2.1  The names of agencies and organizations with which the Agency shares ALPR data, also referred to as "Networks that I’m sharing."
2.2. The names of agencies and organizations from which the Agency receives ALPR data, also referred to as "Flock networks shared with me."
2.3  The names of agencies and organizations with which the Agency shares “hotlist” information, also referred to as "Hotlists that I’m sharing."
2.4  The names of agencies and organizations from which the Agency receives “hotlist” information, also referred to as "Hotlists shared with me."

Please provide any documents in their original electronic, machine readable format. For example, please provide csv or spreadsheet files where applicable.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

RTL

title: Proposals and Award Information for RFQ# 25ITS81MP02 Massachusetts EEC Educator Portal and Credential Management System

communications.subject: Massachusetts Public Records Law Request: Proposals and Award Information for RFQ# 25ITS81MP02 Massachusetts EEC Educator Portal and Credential Management System
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Massachusetts Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

All proposals submitted and Award Information for RFQ# 25ITS81MP02 Massachusetts EEC Educator Portal and Credential Management System. Proposals were due on 12/11/2024.

I expect the request to be filled in an accessible format, including for screen readers, which provide text-to-speech for persons unable to read print. Files that are not accessible to screen readers include, for example, .pdf image files as well as physical documents.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson
